content.question: Which of the following is the approximate projected rate of change in renewable energy consumption from 2010-2040 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="4.33" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.33</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> quadrillion <math alttext="B T Us" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>BTUs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per year

<math alttext="2.33" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.33</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> quadrillion <math alttext="B T Us" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>BTUs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per year

<math alttext="2.00" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.00</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> quadrillion <math alttext="B T Us" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>BTUs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per year

<math alttext="0.733" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.733</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> quadrillion <math alttext="B T Us" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>BTUs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per year

content.answer: <math alttext="2.33" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.33</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> quadrillion <math alttext="B T Us" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>BTUs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per year

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
